name: Shapeshift Shatter
description:
Shapeshift Shatter is a fun and forgiving metroidvania made for the Metroidvania Month 16 game jam. It uses the optional theme of "Shapeshifting"

Note: The web version isn't nearly as performant as the executeable, so considering downloading and playing that way.

Controls

  • Keyboard
    • WASD or Arrow Keys for directional movement
    • E or Z to dash
    • Spacebar to jump
    • M to open the map
    • ESC to pause
  • PS Controller
    • D-Pad for directional movement
    • X to jump
    • SQUARE to dash
    • TRIANGLE to open the map
    • START to pause
  • Xbox Controller
    • D-Pad for directional movement
    • A to jump
    • X to dash
    • Y to open the map
    • START to pause
